description: This version of the  Horse Racing emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supported
apple_vendor_description: The horse racing emoji on Apple devices showcases a dynamic jockey with a medium skin tone, captured mid-stride with palpable energy.  Rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges, the jockey's form suggests swift movement and determination.  The realistic lighting accentuates the subtle textures of their racing silks and the powerful musculature of the horse, conveying a sense of thrilling competition and victory.
